entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @RepMattGaetz U made a fool of yourself wearing a gas mask in Congress while mocking threat of #Covid19. U flew on AirForce1 possibly exposing others. 1 of your constituents died. U must be tested 2ensure U r not a carrier. #ScienceMatters #VoteBlueNoMatterWho #marketcrash2020 #GOPShame
